DzSceneShader Class Reference
[OpenGL Classes]

Base class for GLSL shaders which are used for drawing the entire scene. More...

Detailed Description

Base class for GLSL shaders which are used for drawing the entire scene.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Member Function Documentation

void DzSceneShader::setCurrentMaterial ( const DzMaterial *  mat  )  const [pure virtual]

This function is called by objects as they are drawn in lieu of calling mat->setGL(), allows the shader complete control over how the material parameters are interpreted and passed to OpenGL. Subclasses must implement this function to set needed parameters and OpenGL state for the shader.

Implemented in DzOGLDefaultShader.

void DzSceneShader::unsetCurrentMaterial (  )  const [pure virtual]

This function is called by objects as they are drawn in lieu of calling mat->unsetGL(). It is the counterpart to setCurrentMaterial(). Subclasses must implement this function to clear any necessary OpenGL state changes.

Implemented in DzOGLDefaultShader.
